protein.specific_function: Transports 1 Ca(2+) and 1 K(+) in exchange for 4 Na(+)

reference.reference_text: Li XF, Kraev AS, Lytton J: Molecular cloning of a fourth member of the potassium-dependent sodium-calcium exchanger gene family, NCKX4. J Biol Chem. 2002 Dec 13;277(50):48410-7. Epub 2002 Oct 11.
